title: If you're gonna give BE for FWotD, why are you lowering the XP amount?
body:
Seriously I can't wrap my mind around this. Currently you get 575 XP for FWotD, and recently Rito said they'd start making it give 50 BE. 

Okay, but why are you removing 175 points of XP from the FWotD? There's literally no reason to do this, that's practically an entire game's worth of XP you're removing.
